title: Animal Shelter Caretakers
description: Provide daily care for animals in a shelter setting, including feeding, cleaning, socialization, and enrichment activities. Contribute to the well-being of animals awaiting adoption.

title: Education Program Assistants
description: Support educators in delivering engaging and effective learning experiences. Assist with classroom management, materials preparation, and student interaction.

title: Nutrition Education Workshop Volunteers
description: Share knowledge about healthy eating habits and food preparation in community workshops. Motivate participants to make positive dietary changes.
